inclusion.criterion: Histological documentation of newly diagnosed malignant glioma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of at least 12 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment for high grade glioma
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Previous exposure to Ras pathway inhibitors
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Other concurrent active malignancy (with the exception of cervical carcinoma in situ or non melanoma carcinoma of the skin, superficial bladder tumor [Ta, Tis & T1] or any cancer curatively treated > 3 years prior to study entry).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Serious medical or psychiatric illness that would, in the opinion of the investigator, interfere with the prescribed treatment, including but not limited to: Congestive heart failure > NYHA class 2, active CAD, cardiac arrythmias requiring anti-arrythmic therapy or uncontrolled hypertension within the last 12 months
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Any condition limiting the patient's judgment capacity
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently on high-dose steroids, which may interfere with treatment. Additionally, the patient has a history of bleeding diathesis.
